pullRequest.title: filter by size
pullRequest.bodyText:
Allows to filter a list of GTS by size
$minSize $maxSize filter.bysize

commit.message: move import at same place as before IDE automatic edit

nodes.bodyText: Make those primitive type. They can actually be int since the size of a GTS is an int, not a long.
